task_description: Navigate to Wo Muk Road; outside Tower 3; Union Plaza. Start by taking the left fork at the junction and proceed straight, passing the 'Mount One' building on your left. At the intersection near the park, turn right. Continue along the road for 89m to arrive at Union Plaza on the right.

reason: To follow the instruction to take the left fork at the junction, I should first rotate left to locate the fork and align with the left branch before moving.
Both available moves lead diagonally back-right from this west-facing view, so I should take the closer one to begin following the left fork path efficiently.
To commit to the left fork at the junction, I should take the front-left option that follows the left branch rather than continuing straight.
After taking the left fork, the instruction says proceed straight, so I should continue along the forward path that best maintains this direction.
To keep proceeding straight along this northbound road and look for the 'Mount One' building on the left, I should take the forward option that stays closest to straight ahead.
Continuing straight along the road is still the priority before the park intersection, so I should take the direct forward move.
The road ahead appears to bend left from here, so to keep proceeding along the main route I should take a front-left move rather than turning back.
To continue along the road as it curves and stay on the main forward direction, I should take the slightly front-right move rather than backtracking.
Only one forward option is available and it continues the route toward the upcoming intersection near the park, so I should proceed straight.
Continuing straight remains the best way to reach the park intersection mentioned in the directions.
With the route still extending forward and no indication we've reached the park intersection yet, I should continue straight.
To keep progressing along the main road toward the intersection near the park, I should take the longer forward move.
The route continues ahead with a slight bend to the right, so I should follow it via the front-right option.
Staying on the main road toward the park intersection requires continuing straight ahead.
Continuing forward is the only way to reach the mentioned intersection near the park, so I should proceed straight.
Approaching what could be the intersection area, I should stay on the main forward road rather than taking side branches yet.
This looks like the intersection point where we should turn right (toward the road branching to the right), so I should take the front-right option.
After turning right at the park intersection, I should continue along this new road segment by moving forward/right as it curves.
We need to continue along the road for a long stretch (~89m), so I should keep moving straight ahead.
Staying on this road segment toward Union Plaza means continuing straight forward.
We are still en route along Wo Muk Road after the right turn, so continuing forward is appropriate.
To cover the remaining distance toward Union Plaza, I should keep moving forward along the same road.
Union Plaza should be coming up on the right after this stretch, so I will continue straight ahead.
Continuing forward remains the correct action as we near the expected location of Union Plaza on the right.
We should be close to Union Plaza now, so I will move forward and then check the right side for the plaza/tower signage.
After covering roughly the required distance, the destination should be just ahead on the right, so I should advance one more step.
We have likely reached the Union Plaza frontage area, so I should rotate right to confirm the plaza/building signage on the right side of the road.
Facing east should reveal Union Plaza on the right side of the road; since we appear to be at its frontage, I will stop here.
